feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 9:45AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAVY RAIN FOR LATE WEEK INTO THE WEEKEND... A series of atmospheric rivers will move across the northern half of Southeast Alaska starting early Thursday near Yakutat, and then sliding over the northern inner channels on Friday. The heavier rain is then expected to last through Saturday morning before starting to diminish Saturday afternoon.

entry.title: Excessive Heat Warning issued August 31 at 7:42PM MST until August 31 at 8:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... Temperatures in much of Mohave County will cool going into the weekend, allowing the risk of heat-related illnesses to decrease. Heat-sensitive groups and anyone outdoors for extended periods of time should still take precautions from the heat going through this holiday weekend. Excessive Heat Warnings remain in effect for
